Login.heading: Precision healthcare through wearable data
Login.subheading: Enabling healthcare professionals to leverage wearable's data for precision healthcare.

QuickSharedReport.heading: Quick Sharing Access
QuickSharedReport.subheading: Seamlessy access the Quick Shared Report of your patient.
QuickSharedReport.step_one_description: Generate QR code by clicking button below.
QuickSharedReport.step_two_description: Patient scans QR code via the Vizu Health-mobile application and approves access.
QuickSharedReport.step_three_description: You gain access to your patients wearable data during a limited period of 30 minutes.
QuickSharedReport.generate_qr_code_button: Refresh page to generate new QR code
QuickSharedReport.expired_subheading_1: Your access to the Quick Shared Report has expired.
QuickSharedReport.expired_subheading_2: If you wish to continue viewing your the report, please generate a new QR code and have the patient re-scan it.

dashboard.heading: Welcome,
dashboard.subheading: Access and utilize your patients wearable health data for exploration, monitoring and treatment.

quickSharing.subheading: Access a temporary health report of your patients wearables health data during 30 minutes.

longTermSharing.heading: Long-Term Access
longTermSharing.subheading: Access a detailed health report of your patients wearables health data before, during, and after the appointment.

deleteAccountComponent.delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the account for
deleteAccountComponent.delete_account_explanation: This action cannot be undone. The account will be deleted immediately and the user will lose access to the web application.

createAccountComponent.heading: Create Account
createAccountComponent.subheading: Create an account for a healthcare professional from your clinic.
createAccountComponent.first_name_placeholder: Enter the first name of healthcare professional
createAccountComponent.last_name_placeholder: Enter the last name of healthcare professional
createAccountComponent.email_placeholder: Enter the email of healthcare professional
createAccountComponent.password_subheading: The user will receive a "Set Password"-email to their email inbox allowing them to set their password once the account is created.
createAccountComponent.admin_subheading: Admin accounts are able to manage the billing and accounts of other healthcare professionals inside your clinic/organization.
createAccountComponent.success_subtext_toast_two: was successfully created and they have received email to set their password.

longTermAccess.table_subheading: Search for your patients Long-Term report by their first name, last name or date of birth.
longTermAccess.no_reports: You do not have any Long-Term Reports being shared with you.
longTermAccess.input_placeholder: Search by first name, last name or date of birth of patient

billing.heading: Billing
billing.subheading: Manage your billing and payment details.
billing.expired_subheading: Update billing information to activate premium features.
billing.card_subheading: You manage billing in the Stripe dashboard. Click the button below to access it.

404.heading: Page does not exist
404.subheading: The page you are looking for does not exist or is not available.

onboarding.toast_subheading: Could not finish onboarding. Try again.
onboarding.step_one_subheading: This section will guide you how to use Vizu Health with your patients to effectively utilise their wearable health data for preventive healthcare. Click on the button to start.
onboarding.step_two_subheading: Quick Sharing gives you a temporary access to your patients health report during 30 minutes and it does work for both logged-in and non logged-in healthcare professional users of web application.
onboarding.ai_anomaly_subheading: Our AI detects and highlights anomalies based on each patients individual wearable health data.
onboarding.preventive_plan_subheading: Define a prevention plan, set targets for each biomarker and follow your patients.

quickSharing.heading: Quick Sharing
quickSharing.subheading: Quick Sharing gives you a temporary access to your patients wearable health data during 30 minutes. This functionality is free, meaning it does work for both logged-in and non logged-in healthcare professional users of the Vizu Health-web application.
quickSharing.card_one_subheading: Generate a QR code in the Quick Access-section
quickSharing.card_two_subheading: Patient scans the QR code through the Vizu Health mobile application and approves access.
quickSharing.card_three_subheading: You are redirected to the report page and utilise wearable health data for assessment and treatment.
quickSharing.card_four_subheading: Your report access is only valid for 30 minutes, after which it is revoked.

longTermAccess.heading: Long-Term Access
longTermAccess.subheading: Long-Term Access, also known as Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM), allows you to access your patients health report before, during and after an appointment. The report is continously updated with data every day, providing a rich holistic view of the patients everyday health. Note that the patient is in control regarding what type of data they are sharing, with whom and for how long.
longTermAccess.card_one_subheading: Display your personal QR code from the Long-Term Access-section.
longTermAccess.card_two_subheading: Patient scans the QR code through the Vizu Health mobile application and approves access.
longTermAccess.card_three_subheading: You will now have long-term access to your patients health report. You find all your patients long-term reports by accessing the "Long-Term Sharing"-page through the left navigation menu.
longTermAccess.card_four_subheading: You can seamlessly access your patient's health report with their wearables data before, during and after the appointment to identify patterns, trends and zoom-in on specific events.
longTermAccess.premium_feature: Long-Term Access is premium functionality only accessible for active premium healthcare users of the Vizu Health-web application.

anomalyDetection.heading: Anomaly Detection
anomalyDetection.subheading: Detects anomalies based on each patients individual wearable health data and highlights the time periods, if any anomalies are detected. You are able to easily utilize the data in your exploration, monitoring and treatment of your patients.
anomalyDetection.card_one_subheading: Go to the Long-Term Report of your patient.
anomalyDetection.card_two_subheading: Click on the Anomaly Detection-button, select the biomarkers and algorithms of anomalies you wish to investigate and confirm your choices.
anomalyDetection.card_three_subheading: The wearable health data of the patient is being analysed for detection of anomalies.
anomalyDetection.card_four_subheading: You are presented with the result of the analysis of anomalies detection.
anomalyDetection.premium_feature: Anomaly Detection is premium functionality only accessible for active premium healthcare users of the Vizu Health-web application as part of the Long-Term Access.

preventionPlan.heading: Personalised Preventive Plan
preventionPlan.subheading: Define a prevention plan and set targets for each biomarker. Follow the progress of your patients and early-detect hidden symptoms. Patients are able to see their preventive plan in the mobile app.
preventionPlan.card_one_subheading: Go to the Long-Term Report of your patient and click on the Prevention Plan-button.
preventionPlan.card_two_subheading: You can view the active plan (if existing), select a pre-defined template with biomarkers or create your own.
preventionPlan.card_three_subheading: Specify the thresholds for each of the biomarkers in the plan and confirm it by button at the bottom of the panel.
preventionPlan.card_four_subheading: View the currently active preventive plan by clicking the Preventive Plan-section with a blinking green dot.
preventionPlan.premium_feature: Personalised Preventive Plan is premium functionality only accessible for active premium healthcare users of the Vizu Health-web application  as part of the Long-Term Access.

LongTermReportPage.error_subheading: An unexpected error occured. Please try again.
LongTermReportPage.access_denied_subheading: Activate subscription to activate premium functionality.
LongTermReportPage.general_overview_subheading: Highlightning days deviating from the thresholds.
LongTermReportPage.adjust_thresholds_subtext: Adjust the thresholds for the biomarkers displayed in the General Overview Calendar.

SetReminderDialog.heading: Reminder
SetReminderDialog.subheading: Set a reminder to look at your patients Long-Term Report.
SetReminderDialog.subheading2: You will receive the reminder as an email to your inbox at the scheduled time.
SetReminderDialog.frequency_subheading: Set the frequency of the reminder.
SetReminderDialog.time_subheading: Set the starting day and time of the reminder.

ThresholdForm.blood_pressure_diastolic_subheading: Adjust the minimum and maximum values for diastolic blood pressure

PreventiveThresholdForm.sleepDuration_subheading: Adjust the minimum & maximum hours of sleep.

PreventiveThresholdForm.avgHeartRate_subheading: Adjust the daily average heart rate.
PreventiveThresholdForm.avgBreaths_subheading: Adjust the minimum and maximum breaths per minute during sleep.

PreventivePlans.heading: Preventive Plans
PreventivePlans.subheading: Select one of our predefined preventive plan templates or define one yourself.
PreventivePlans.tired_fatigue_subheading: Define a plan for tiredness & fatigue.
PreventivePlans.chronic_pain_subheading: Define a plan for chronic pain.
PreventivePlans.general_health_subheading: Define a plan for general health.
PreventivePlans.no_plan_subheading: Create a Prevention Plan to follow-up on with the patient and visualize it in the calendar.
